content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (no other drill found) 

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0) and steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belt at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5) and transport belt at position(x=64.5, y=-53.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them, as seen in burner-mining-drill and burner-inserter entities with status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.
- Ensure that burner entities are connected to a power source or have the necessary ingredients before using them.

### Errors when using steam engine
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a boiler and a power source, as seen in the steam engine entity with status EntityStatus.NOT_CONNECTED.

### Errors when using electricity group
- Ensure that the electricity group is plugged into an electric network, as seen in the electricity group entity with status EntityStatus.NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK.

### Errors when using pipe group
- Ensure that the pipe group is not empty and has a full output, as seen in the pipe group entity with status EntityStatus.EMPTY and EntityStatus.FULL_OUTPUT.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions or important variables were found in the provided logs.
